name: R E D
description:
Please play the downloadable version for the true experience.

HTML BUILD IS OUT!!!1! (tho it might be a little buggy!!) (and looks a bit worse because of limitations of html!!)

R E D is a short horror game where you can change whether the game is 2d or 3d. Made for the Haunted PS1 Game Jam in a month.

The game is hard but beatable.

HOW TO PLAY

AWSD - MOVE

SHIFT - RUN

Q - SWITCH 2D/3D

E - PROCEED

CREDITS

Programming,2D Sprites and Animations,Game Design made by kakoon

Music,Sound Effects made by  sourjoe itch, website

Special thanks to Reedly and Niano for being awesome

Premade Assets Used
